price: 96 qui associent d’autres divinités au culte du Seigneur. Mais ils sauront bientôt !
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجۡعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yajʿalūna maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fasawfa yaʿlamūna
